Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.conditions

Interface Summary
Condition<T> Interface for a condition check on an object.
 

Class Summary
And<T> Condition that combines other conditions using AND.
ArrayHasOnlyNulls<T> Checks that all elements of an array are null.
ComparisonCondition<T> Abstract Condition based on a comparison done by a comparator.
ConditionOnProperty<T> Checks a condition on a property of the specified object.
ConditionOnTransformation<A,P> Applies a condition on a transformation of the specified object.
EqualityCondition<T> Is equal Condition.
EqualsIgnoreCaseCondition Is equal Condition.
EqualTo<T> Comparison condition that check that the specified object is equal to an object that is specified at the constructor of the condition.
ExistsIn<T> Condition that checks if an object exists in a collection.
False<T> Condition that is always false.
GreaterThan<T> Comparison condition that check that the specified object is greater than an object that is specified at the constructor of the condition.
GreaterThanOrEqual<T> Comparison condition that check that the specified object is greater than or equal to an object that is specified at the constructor of the condition.
InstanceOf Checks if the specified object is an instance of the class that is specified in the Condition's constructor.
IsNotNull<T> Is not null Condition.
IsNull<T> Is null Condition.
IsWithinRange<T extends Comparable<? super T>> Condition that checks if a comparable object is within a range.
LessThan<T> Comparison condition that check that the specified object is less than an object that is specified at the constructor of the condition.
LessThanOrEqual<T> Comparison condition that check that the specified object is less than or equal to an object that is specified at the constructor of the condition.
MatchingCondition<L,R> Adapts a MatchingRule to the Condition interface.
Not<T> Condition that creates the negative check of a specified condition.
NotInitialized<T> Checks if an object is not initialized, in the sense that all of its properties are null.
Or<T> Condition that combines other conditions using OR.
PropertiesAreNotNull<T> Checks that all listed properties of an object are not null.
PropertiesEqual<T> Checks a condition on a property of the specified object.
PropertyEqualsTo<T>  
PropertyExistsIn<T> Condition that checks if a property of an object exists in a collection.
PropertyIsNotNull<T> Checks if the specified property is null.
PropertyIsNull<T> Checks if the specified property is null.
PropertyIsWithinRange<T,P extends Comparable<? super P>> Condition that checks if a property of an object is within a range.
RangeContainsValue<P extends Comparable<? super P>> Checks Ranges to find if they contain a specific value.
StringNotEmpty String not empty condition.
True<T> Condition that is always true.
ValueIsWithinRangeDefinedByProperties<T,P extends Comparable<? super P>> Checks that a specified value is within the limits defined by two properties.
VmMemoryPercentageReachedCondition Condition that checks if the used memory in the JVM has reached or exceeded a specific percentage of the available memory.
